message.name: ERR_MANDATORY_SCRIPT_TYPE
message.locale: Script type is a mandatory field.

message.name: ERR_MANDATORY_SCRIPT_EXECUTION
message.locale: Script execution id is a mandatory field.

message.name: ERR_MANDATORY_DATA_STORE_ID
message.locale: Datastore ID is a mandatory field.

message.name: ERR_MANDATORY_APPLICATION_RELATED_ID
message.locale: Related ID is a mandatory field.

message.name: ERR_MANDATORY_APPLICATION_DATASTORE_ID
message.locale: Datastore ID is a mandatory field.

message.name: ERR_MANDATORY_APPLICATION_DATASTORE_SCHEMA
message.locale: Datastore Schema is a mandatory field.

message.name: ERR_NOT_INTAKE_SCRIPT_SUBMIT
message.locale: Only intake, life event and submission scripts can be submitted.

message.name: ERR_INVALID_ACCESS_TO_SCRIPT_EXECUTION
message.locale: You can no longer access the information you have entered. This is most likely due to your session being timed out. Your session is timed out for security reasons if you have not entered any data for several minutes. You will need to start again and re-enter your information.
